name: Monster Dreams
description:
Play this entertaining game and become a sleeping monster that has very vivid dreams.

• Play with different monsters
• Try to avoid the many fun obstacles in your way
• Grab as many coins as you can
• Very easy one-touch controls
• Try to achieve the highest score among your friends
_________________

Stay updated on new features!
